net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO

Class ByteIOProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO.ByteIOProvider

  • public class ByteIOProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    LineIOprovider - This class returns a LineIO class appropriate for the supplied file structure
    Version:
    0.55
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
